name: cm_immort_02
text: No grave can hold me!
text_simple: no grave can hold me

name: alch_immort_02
text: Does Immortality work for both of us? It better!

name: timb_immort_02
text: They can't kill me. Nobody can.

name: hoodwink_rival_05_81
text: Hate to shatter your dreams, you frigid idiot.

text: If I had a gold piece for every Oglodi I killed, I'd have enough to start using acorns for impractical purposes.

text: Hoods are way better than masks. Just saying.
